scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Ruthanne Davis
scrape.text: Haunting,brilliant and a fast read because it propels you forward like an avalanche...a very dark and scary one. There are subtle comments and clues along the way as personalities within these two families are revealed. You are not expected to like what you learn about any of them. There is a tingling sort of tension that grows with each chapter. You will really wish you could find someone to share your thoughts and feelings with when you reach the last page!
